text: Ni dang xiang xinyang bing xingshan zhe baoxi, tamen jiang huode zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Mei dang tamen cong leyuan li shou ci yi zhong shuiguo zuo jiyang shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Zhe zhong jiyang jiushi women yiqian shou ciguo de.” Qishi, tamen suo shou ci de shi xiangsi de [xing tong wei butong]. Tamen zai leyuan li you chunjie de qizi [peiban], tamen jiang yong ju qizhong.
